main.slogan: Play to Earn! Free to Start!
main.subslogan:
New NFT trading card game coming soon!
Collect and grow rare animal cards, form your herds, fight with other players and sell your cards to other traders.
main.Become_a_Ranger_in_a_New_World!: Become a Ranger in a New World!
main.Join_our_Discord: Join our Discord and Telegram for launch details.

carousel-01.title: Introducing Wildalo: A Sustainable Play2Earn Web3 Game
carousel-01.description: Wildalo is a new type of web3 game. It brings the best of free to play mechanics, engaging gameplay, artistic NFT collections and player-first attitude in a game metaverse designed for sustainability in mind. Wildalo is an exciting new world filled with Wildlings.
carousel-01.label: Read the Medium Article

carousel-02.title: Wildalo is featured on Gamepedia
carousel-02.description: Wildalo is a blockchain-based card and adventure game that utilizes the Avalanche network with its NFT assets and cryptocurrencies, FODR, and WARC. The game combines free-to-play with play-to-earn, which means players can start the game for free and make a profit while having fun playing the game.
carousel-02.label: Check it out on Gamepedia

carousel-03.title: Wildalo whitepaper is live content
carousel-03.description: Thinking about the P2E games today there are some issues such as token & NFT sales without any game launches, high economic barriers to play, and uncontrolled inflation/volatility in game currencies. Also in many of these games, the players do not have any control on the game dynamics.
carousel-03.label: Read the Whitepaper

main.who_we_are_description: We gathered aroung two OG gamers and Googlers, both have been playing games for 20+ years as well as being active in the gaming community. We are excited by the potential of web3 to revolutionize gaming for the benefit of the gamers and the gaming industry. Our passionate team is decentralized just like web3 hailing from Silicon Valley, Turkey, Finland, Ireland and Sweden.

guide.title: Guide
guide.description: You can read the short guides we have prepared for you to get to know the game and its ecosystem better. And for much more, you can meet the community and find answers to your questions by using our Discord and Telegram channels.

hero.title: Play to Earn! Free to Start!
hero.sub_title: You have been gifted 5 *Captive Wildlings for joining us.
hero.description: You can find your free wildlings under Wilding & Herds, you can create your first herd and start earning right away!

wah.Drag: Drag the wildlings you want to include

modal.help_content: ["How do I set up MetaMask on Avalanche?","Join our Discord Server","Join our Telegram Group","Download Metamask"]

extension.content: In order to play the game, your Metamask plugin must be installed and the avalanche network must be set.

network.header: Wrong network selected in your wallet!
network.content: Please change to Avalanche network to continue! If you need help you can use the Metamask setup guide on Avalanche.

permission.content: Please connect your Metamask wallet to play. Kindly mind that Avalanche Network needs to be selected to continue as well.
